trans-unit.source: Describes how abstract content is mapped into a concrete format.

This abstract class forms the base class for the following classes: - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBinding> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding>
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"></xref> class.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref> of which the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"></xref> is a member.

Each of the classes derived from the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding> class corresponds to a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) element (`<input>`, `<output>` or `<fault>`) enclosed by the `<operation>` element, which is in turn enclosed by the `<binding>` element.
The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding> class corresponds to that `<operation>` element in the WSDL document.
For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
An <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref> of which the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"></xref> is a member.
